lines.name: KEVIN

But please remember that all the people at home are still watching, say hi to the people at home, hi people at home.

lines.text: The current Loot Crate theme for July is Futuristic, includes a lot of awesome Rick and Morty, Futurama, Mega Man, Valiant Comic stuff, Star Trek, that fun element there. We've got music playing, it's on. Oh man, I feel like things are happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Music works, you guys, music works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. Perfect. Tech stuff is coming together. Yeah, so Futuristic is their crate theme this month. We also have the anime Loot Crate is themed Squadron. Has a bunch of stuff from Gundam, Gate, Arpeggio of Blue Steel, Antimagic Academy, a lot of exclusive stuff, of course you guys can go ahead and get $3 off a subscription by going to lootcrate.com/criticalrole and putting in "criticalrole," one word, in your nice little Loot Crate subscription bonus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I chew on Goku's head a lot. I'm a fixated-- it's cool.

lines.name: MATT

So, if you haven't checked it out yet, check out Loot Crate, thank you guys so much for sponsoring our show, we love you. Great. So. Next up we have-- we recently had a t-shirt contest, didn't we? Laura, if you want to take that away for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we got hacked, which means we made it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering and booing)

lines.text: Look, the whole San Fernando Valley's blue, okay, give me something! All right, anyway. Yeah, it's become a thing. And we have another cool announcement. Travis, do you want to take it away on that one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes we do, the response to this live event was so amazing that we are super stoked to announce that we are going to also be doing Critical Role live in Indianapolis during GenCon on August 6, Saturday night. Tickets will go on sale- I think they're on sale now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hell yeah. So if this wasn't nerve-wracking enough for me, we have another one in a couple of weeks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pressure's on, dude, pressure's on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Check it out. Hopefully we'll see you guys there. That brings us to the end of our announcements and will bring us down--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. Before we go into not-regular announcements, should we make sure that people know that we're not having an episode next week because of Comic-Con?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, actually, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Way to bring down the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're on! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, all right, we've got to do a story here! It's appreciated, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should probably just finish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, bringing us in now, back to tonight's episode of Critical Role. Guys, pay attention.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Illithid syphilis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The camera's already on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Our intrepid band of adventurers, Vox Machina, found themselves recently traversing the Feywild in search of another Vestige of Divergence. In doing so, they managed to find an old friend in the nymph Nahla, acquired some information, trading a book, and found their way towards the ever-shifting grasses northward in search of where the Divergence, the object of the Divergence lies. In doing so, they found a new ally, a new friend. A little satyr by the name of, where is it here--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Garmelie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you guys walk through the beautiful verdant city, tall seemingly endless trees around you, many buildings naturally formed and built from smoothly carved stone, various ancient

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like I should be very stern right now, but I can't stop smiling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're gloomy. Lock it up, here we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like the first thing we need to do is go see our father.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right off the bat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's the one that's going to give us access to the rest of the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Is Iova still here, or has she trundled off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's walked off. She literally let you guys in the city and went, do what you've got to do, and then turned away and the rest of the guards--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh seriously, so like... no, no the guard is following us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we remember where we're going, right, because it's all the same as it was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The city is the same as it was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I imagine we'd go to his home. Our home. His home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time is it? I mean, we don't know what time it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's dusk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we just woke up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at all those elves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So many elves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the little satyr-- is he holding onto my skirts, basically?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually don't feel a general presence, and then as you move you feel a slight tug at your belt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so can I like, how far away is that guard that's on our tail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 15, 20 feet back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah. Can I like super slyly whisper, okay, so at any point are you going to tell us what it is you want us to fucking steal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a whispered voice that curls up by your ear, strangely given the fact that he's so small, so the voice is being thrown right into the side of your eardrum, goes, "Just be quiet! Find a "place in which we can speak privately, and then I will be happy to tell you. Shh! Stop talking to "the air; it upsets them."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's really quite normal for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Grog. You should really watch that gas of yours with him back there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (fart sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (coughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. That's the family reserve. Oh, he said we're supposed to find somewhere quiet to talk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we should do that first, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have guards fucking following us. We have to go find our father.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably have a conversation with whoever's in charge. Is your father in charge?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a bureaucrat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, let's go see Dad, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Your pants, they're sagging a little bit, why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) They're sagging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's like the new rage amongst the kids. It gives me super street cred.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Garmelie?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, shut up about Garmelie!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, ix-nay on the Garmelie-- I think I'm doing Pig Latin wrong. Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's this way. And I start walking off towards Dad's house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to follow the twins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look regal and as we pass elves I say, good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The few that look in your direction, Keyleth, take a moment to nod, look you over and then continue walking, seemingly perturbed by the sudden interaction and the immediate realization that you're not of full blood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sorry Keyleth, your ears aren't large enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not normally what people tell me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not the size of your ears...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. As you guys continue following Vax'ildan towards the abode of their father, you keep an eye out towards the rest of Syngorn proper. You see the further into the city you go, interspersed with a few Emon guards, you see a handful of individuals that are human, and they're dressed in the actual attire of the guards of Emon, and they're intermingling right now with the Verdant Guard, the military might within Syngorn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What were the name of the guards in Emon? Did they have a name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Emon guard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, totally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a name, and it's somewhere in my notes but we're good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From this perspective, I can see your panic folder. It's so exciting. That's where the magic happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's true, we never really see that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. You guys continue making your way towards the abode. After traversing on the outskirts of what would be the tangleward side of the city, the eastern side, you travel in through an area of buildings that are very beautifully crafted, many of which seem to have stemmed from some sort of a tree growth, but upon closer look you can see that it's actually carved stone to resemble a tree. And then it eventually rises up into a somewhat spherical building, and there are many that build off of that to create this kind of neighborhood of various elven abodes within Syngorn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking hate this place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me, too. It's hideous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is gorgeous. Look at the craftsmanship. It's incredible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find your way to the end of the main road, and it splits into two smaller avenues. You know to take the left that leads deeper into the more political family houses of Syngorn. While your family is not a political house per se, your father, as an ambassador to Emon, was given a home in this location. It is your old home, although it appears to have been even further renovated and is much nicer than you remember, but the door is closed and the dusk sun leads you to pause as you look upon the outside of this abode you have not seen in many, many years.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to burn it down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we getting in a fight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. No fights.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards now step up and flank a little bit, keeping a close eye as you've now approached and effectively knocked on the handle of a relatively middle-to-high-ranking individual within Syngorean society. Eventually the door opens and you see a woman standing there: bright blonde hair, braided and tied up in the back. She's wearing more of a work-gown for the day. You recognize her as Devana, the new wife of Syldor, the one that you had once met before in Emon when you guys came upon your father last time. As the door opens up, she looks out for a second, taking in the whole group that has gathered on the outside of their home and goes, "My god. Vax'ildan, Vex'ahlia, we "weren't expecting you!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I can't imagine you were. Is he here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He is."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glances out, looks up. "That's always a good question. The longer we stay in these realms, "the more confused my daughter becomes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long has that been?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Weeks now, I assume. Best that our timepieces can keep."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Velora around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She is, would you like to see her?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come in. Is it just you two?"

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's everyone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket, you remember Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises) Nudges your arm to the side and comes forward and sniffs out to Devana. She shrinks back a little bit and reaches her hand out to the nose and taps the edge of Trinket's face, and Trinket licks her fingers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good day. They respond better if you say "good day" and if you have your head up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we say "bidet?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bidet, yes. Good day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bidet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So close. So very close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two guards closest to you, within their helmets their eyes narrow, they look at each other and shake their heads.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, bidet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your accent is perfect. Don't change a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And they both, "We were given orders, milady, to--" "I understand that. But this is already a lot of people in our home. Stay close within earshot, "it'll be fine. I trust them." The guards, (sighs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wink at them as I walk inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point that thought process is broken as Devana steps in and goes, "Would anyone like tea, perhaps?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yes, do you have an oolong?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe a chamomile, it would be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Something like that, yes. It's been a little scarce in the Feywilds. More difficult to "farm herbs here than you'd think."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some glisfoil and other things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Appreciate that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They won't scream at you when you pick them. Good. It's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. What was your name again?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm Keyleth of the Ashari.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A pleasure to meet you again--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's, that's really not necessary in my home. You, sir, your name?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever's available would be just fine.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: I think she means your name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a curious title."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you can call him whatever's available, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, coffee table. What's your name?" (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's easier than the actual name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For you, it is just Percival, and I am another visiting royal from man's world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. You, sir?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am called the Kingslayer, Chuck Norris, Burt Reynolds. I have many names. You see, when you've traveled a road as long as I have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Black tea, got it. And you, sir, the large one?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Bidet. The name is Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. I'll return with Syldor once he knows you're here. It may be a while if you don't "mind waiting, but the tea will come out posthaste."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Velora? Where's she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What a battle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, some of us, at least." And he looks over to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good day, indeed." He comes up and sits, and he's wearing long, dark brown robes with golden and red embroidery on the side, but it's very casual home wear, and he sits down, pulling up a chair across from you guys in this area, and takes one of the cups of tea and sips it. And you can see there's an intensity to his face. He's here, and he looks like he's partially inconvenienced by your presence like he always did, but he also looks like he hasn't slept well, there's some dark circles under his eyes and he seems a little distracted for such a climactic re-meeting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Surprise!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Surprise, indeed. So. It's good to see you both. Glad you're in good health. You've come "quite a ways to come speak with me, being as we currently reside within the Feywild."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a little bit further than we thought we'd have to travel, why... the presence around the city we're seeing? We understand why you fled, but what's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look. We had the entire Fort Daxio army down here and we were to give aid to push into the "nearby mountain range where apparently there was an influx of lizardfolk, had been a continuous "problem, and apparently a break had been seen somewhere. However, we had sent most of our forces "into the mountain range and then received word that three great drakes were making their way "straight toward Syngorn after the destruction of Emon. Knowing that, we had no recourse but to flee "and prepare when it was time. Had we stood our ground, we would be the same burning crater that "your fair city is now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you intend to go back? You're amassing this army to go back and join the fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is exactly what we're doing. The remnants of the Emon army we currently have here "in the city, we've been building armor and weapons to make sure the most sure-footed and "strong-of-arm men and women of our fair city can make it to that battlefield "and tear that beast down."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's wonderful news.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Why are you here?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are here on a very similar range of business, to be honest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you are?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are looking for some objects: a few things that may help us in our fight against these dragons that have attacked us. We've already made headway against them, and we've already made headway on our quest to destroy them. Any help that your wonderful city could provide would be most agreeable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. We currently have all of our resources engaged in our plans of attack. There is "not much we could offer you other than, if you wish to stay here within the city, we could "provide a place to sleep, food, and when the time is right you may join our ranks into the fray."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've come to the Feywild for something specific.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're trying to head to the Shademirk Bog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why on earth would you be heading to the Shademirk?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're looking for the bow of Fenthras. It supposedly lives inside of a cancerous tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. Well. Good luck with that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it's possible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think it's a fool's errand to chase a fleeting rumor into a location that is known to "devour and destroy anyone who steps within its bounds. But by all means, you've always been ones "seeking the darkness."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear Velora chuckle. Devana's like, "Shh! Quiet!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to pull Velora over and sit her in my lap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She (raspberry noise) at her mom as you pick her up there. You can see Devana smiles as she does so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Syldor, we have killed two of these dragons already. Nothing could please me more to hear that you are amassing forces here to go back; that is possibly the greatest thing I've ever heard you say to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to insight check him and see if he's really saying--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do that shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Him or me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 26 on him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I'd whisper, but the microphone makes it useless. It's fine. He appears tired, he appears like a lot of his intention and time has been put towards something important--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Being a giant dick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. But he doesn't appear to be lying or fudging the truth at all, he's just tired. He says, "Look. There are a lot of pieces at work here. If you have your own path, by all means. And "while I have heard of some of your exploits, and I am quite impressed, I hate to be blunt, but it's "difficult and strange to mingle family new and old. Your presence here brings up difficult "memories for me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you poor man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't worry. We're not here to look for family. That would entail some amount of investment on either our side or yours. There is clearly none. We are here to do business. Do you know where the bog is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. It's duskward of here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Duskward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, some people go this way, and some people go that way, and some people go both ways.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like being on a ship forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've been here working along with the heads of the "city to make sure we are ready for this attack."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When do you plan to attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A few weeks."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're joining other armies. You don't plan to fight Thordak on your own?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have a few groups that are set on the other side of the veil in the prime realm and they are "keeping an eye out for this. A few scouting parties are in Emon as we speak, trying to gather "intel on Thordak himself. Once we have that information and we can formulate what to expect, "then we can attack."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're trying to go after Thordak himself. That's your first target, Thordak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's currently the largest threat to our safety, our home, and our return. Don't think this "is the first time a red dragon of that size has been felled. There have been ancient ages of "various deaths from his people. It's not impossible, but we need to be ready."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I take it you're their leader."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of the dragons? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He very slowly sighs while grabbing his tea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've clearly lost your father. It's all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His intelligence is very low, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the interest of dealing with Thordak, we are going to need access to libraries, any of your people who may know something about this bog, and accommodations befitting those of us who are titled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As well as access to certain parts of the city. We need some items to acquire within the city before we set out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, it would be nice to find shelter for those of us who are not titled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is more of an assam, I would say? A black tea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is technically what you do, though, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Devana says, "I'm terribly sorry, I didn't mean that--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, not you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Syldor crosses his fingers together and, "I can give you a letter that will grant you entry to "a few of our general storehouses. However, most of you are outsiders and others have been ostracized "in their own right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you will respect titled entry. Those of us who are court can converse with court.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your title, your court, is unfamiliar with me. I doubt it will hold sway within this town, "this city, this entire realm. But you speak of great importance, are you the leader of this "troop, he who brings up words of courts and titles?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the moment, why not? I will say, I know the Feywild by reputation, and by reputation you are known for your manners, and any kingdom should be measured by manners as the currency that is the easiest to come across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. Daughter. Son. What else do you need of me?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Honestly? Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't need or want anything from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yet you still came to my home."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well. Yeah. We got what we wanted, which is access to the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not here to be friends or rekindle anything, but it seems like we want the same thing, in a roundabout way. We want to end these dragons. We want to return the world to what it once was. Any help you can give in spite of our past, in spite of all the bullshit between us will be appreciated by more than just she and I.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We know you have no love for us. Think of those you do love. And I hug Velora. Don't you want to make her safe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's exactly what I intend to do. If you wish to help in that, then so be it. I'll pull "what I can within the city. (sighs) Just leave me to my business, please." You see for a moment there, for all the facade, all the front that he puts up, that strong distance facade, you see the fatigue break through, and there's a, like a dark heartbreak. "This is a greater threat than we've "ever faced in our lifetime, and many of those in this city have lived quite a while. We have to do "things right. Don't be foolish. Too many lives have been lost at the hands of these dragons, some "closer than others."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know of anyone that has traversed more of the Feywild, that would know of what we might expect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One who's seen the most would be the High Warden. I could probably get you passage to see "her, but you're going to be

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It will.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Curious manners, your friends." He takes his tea and pours another cupful, and leans back in his chair. "Two dragons you say you've killed."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: More than that, isn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of the Conclave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of the Conclave, we've killed two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which ones?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Umbrasyl. And. What was the other one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blitzen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blitzen, Donner? What was the name of the other one? Oh, it was General Krieg!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The blue one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then we've also killed a white one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brimscythe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Brimscythe. That's the one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But also we respect him enough to learn his name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, your story has charm. I have to admit, I have gotten word of at least one dragon "felled on the other side."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out a dragon's tooth from Umbrasyl out of my pocket and I toss it to him. That's the result of the doings of your children. You should be very proud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean no disrespect, and it's fine in this trying "time. But while you two may have undergone much ridicule in your youth, I saved you from the brunt "of it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You-- headphones, dear-- you fucked some random woman in a city you passed through, and you expect us to feel sorry for you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should've left us to be with our mother when she died!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why? Why pull us away from her if you had no love? We would have been happy with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because I had hope that you would be worth more, given that you had my blood in your veins, "than to waste away in some small hovel."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want no part of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry. That's all I can say." Devana goes, "Anyone want any more tea? Oolong, you said."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, yes." And she leaves, awkwardly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just so you know, what they did against the dragons was incredible. All of the rest of us were like, "Ah! Oh, we're dying! We don't have anything we can do!" And then they were like "Kill! Stab!" And then--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy! No, don't die!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm being blood out of your jugular, just go with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then they killed them all! It's the only reason we're alive, really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That does indeed sound quite crazy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, the balls on this one-- this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's be honest, Grog. They both have--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lord Grog Peanut Butter of Strongjaw. I'm titled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd say they've both proven to have more balls than most of those in our city."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, we're never going to be a happy family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. That is right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But if you want to make reparations, help us on our path. It will only help you on yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stands up from his chair and walks his way back to his study and closes the door behind him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, fuck. Guess he's not into us now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought we weren't getting in a fight!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to take a dump somewhere?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, headphones, darling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls your hand down, looks at you, says, "Take a dump!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. I mean, shoot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like him."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's gnomish. Doesn't mean the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's now transfixed on Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Darling, he takes blue sparkly poos!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Blue sparkle poos? Can you teach me?" (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any blueberries?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to ask my mom if we've got blueberries."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She runs off to the kitchen. A few minutes pass, and Devana comes out holding the tea on the cart and goes, "Who taught my daughter to say 'blue sparkly poo?'"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what you're talking about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a swear word?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should really control the people in this city from talking about that, because it's weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She got it at preschool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So many soldiers everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Velora, go to your room."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've never heard a soldier say, "Ah, blue sparkly poo!" I feel like she didn't get that from a soldier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've never really been in war, have you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's the most my power can do at this time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a belt buckle, why are you passing me this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (stage-whispering) We're playing pretend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, oh, it's a sealed scroll now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: May I see that really quickly? Don't throw it! Pretend!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretend. I'm pretend handing it off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, good object work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now get in the canoe!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right, they're all elves. I can't look at them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it flew away!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This grants an audience for all of us, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Lady Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lady?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So good sir, despite your relationship with her, do watch your manners.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tea spit take!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My apologies, Lady Vex'ahlia."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will make the amendment immediately." And he stands back up, takes it from Percival and makes his way back to the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Darth Vader.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good luck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a gift from your mother.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should thank Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you do intend to make your way towards the Shademirk, be careful. Be safe. And if "anything comes your way that you feel you are incapable of handling, run. We don't need heroes "right now, we need survivors."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No promises?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He shoots you a very dark look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Sorry. The House of Peanut Butter will continue its bloodline. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will send word. Where can I send word to retrieve you when the time is ready for us to attack?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have accommodations in the city?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, but we'll be in Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will send word to Whitestone when we plan to return to the Prime Material, and preparing our "forces for attack upon Thordak in Emon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If not, reach out to Allura of Emon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know Allura well, and I can reach to her."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you hitting on their dad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does everything look like hitting on people to you, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the Scanlan filter. It's on Snapchat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take them off!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stands up and at this point Devana enters beside him, puts her hand on his shoulder. He looks to you with his hands crossed before him and goes, "I wish you luck and safe journeys. I "appreciate you coming by. It was good to see you both."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did our sister go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns and Devana goes, "She's in her room for using bad language."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poo is a really terrible word to say, I think. Good thing she didn't say any of the other words that she heard in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold on." And she leaves and comes back, this time pushing Velora from the back, and Velora walks up pouting with her arms crossed, holding her little owlbear under her arm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She runs up and gives you a big hug. "Are you leaving?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, just for a little bit, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You just got here!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. Listen, do me a favor? Keep scraping up those knees, will you? You crawl anywhere you want in this city, the higher the better. And listen to your parents some of the time. But not all of the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can already do that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you a little kiss on the cheek and then runs up and puts her arms around you and almost pushes you back, she's bigger than you remember.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She is. I pull out one of my owlbear feathers that I picked up with Zahra and I tuck it behind her ear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's this?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an owlbear feather. I know! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She steps back down and looks at her little plushie and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You keep that behind your ear, and you wear your necklace, and you never forget that Vex and Vax love you very, very much, dear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are our sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Come back soon, please!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: isity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Devana rolls her eyes and goes, "Ugh. Thank you. So much."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shit's a good word, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Covers her ears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we doing that now? Penis wiggle! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Devana's looking cornered, it's like, (shushing noises). Syldor actually starts laughing. "I hope that's good day, then!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bidet.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!" The door closes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're those terrible-influence side of the family, aren't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the gift of smugness, it never goes away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, is it real-- no. Was it all just to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no house and there's no money--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the one Scanlan burned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the one that Scanlan burned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're the lady of the house that I burned down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And there's just a crypt and that's being used for other things, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you have a title!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you do have a title, at the very least. And once a year, you have to do something ridiculous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even so, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thank you so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Use it in good health.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I lean over to Scanlan and I say, did you notice that their dad was saying "bidet" wrong?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did. I did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought he was like a highfalutin type.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should just say it even louder to make sure people know the correct pronunciation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. We could be a force for good in and outside of the city. Bidet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bidet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards that are waiting for you outside of the house just sigh very loudly. (sighs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Change is hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't walked through Syngorn and been forcing people to show you the respect you've always wanted, and there is something slightly cathartic about that. But you manage to find accommodations for the evening's rest. The guards proceed up into the secondary floor where your room is kept. Will not enter the room, but notify you that they will be staying outside of the doorway to ensure that both you are protected and that you don't do anything crazy in the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's stupid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're respectable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's adorable that they think they could stop us if we tried.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! Are we all in rooms next to each other, are we in one room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a series of rooms within what looks like it was at one time a military barracks that has since been renovated. It's not really an inn or tavern; there aren't a lot of travelers that come through Syngorn that don't actually live there or have a home, so it's more being used for storage, but they cleared out an area and they put up beds and it looks-- Syngorn storage room is pretty nice by the standards of like Kymal or Westruun, so it's not too bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all I can really ask.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have they already locked us in our rooms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you've just gotten to your rooms now, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're a very religious group and we like to have a family prayer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Speaking of, wait. Where the fuck is Pike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was right behind us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all, you all realize in the chaos and the tension of meeting your father--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Must've gotten lost!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she's here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The walls--can't maintain--" And her form vanishes once again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, now we'll never have them as a sponsor. Thank you, Travis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go T-Mobile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go AT-- No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So can we have like a little family pow-wow in maybe one of the rooms before we all tuck in for the night and you put the masking tape over each of our doors so we don't sneak into each other's rooms. High school field trip, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know any of those words.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do as you wish, we'll be here if you need us."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you need anything, drinks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to talk to the little fucker.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then-- oh, what? Oh, yeah! Well, let's all head inside for prayer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll need food and drink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guard! One of you, could you go get us some food? We're very hungry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And wine? Maybe some wine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As a baroness, I'm very used to getting food when I want it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the guards steps forward and says, "Let me see that parchment once more, please?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My belt buckle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolls it back up, hands it back. "I will retrieve your necessary meal, drink, and other "requests you may have."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Chicken, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. I want anything but chicken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Noted and noted." And he turns around and leaves the three other guards standing outside of your rooms to do about as you please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right, so we pick the biggest room and we all enter it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a two-bedroom, opposite sides, and there is a window that has a beautiful view of the central lake that sits at the center of Syngorn, the entire city's built around, before it meets the base of the mountain range that it's buttressed against.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Titicaca.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That sounds Elvish, but it's not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I just like saying that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Door closes behind you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gormidi?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a little flash, a sparkle of arcane light as the satyr form goes, (breathes heavily) "That was a little harrowing. You didn't tell me you were going to bring me into the belly of the "beast so soon, we didn't even talk about-- that was really good tea, by the way; "that was quite delicious."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were drinking our tea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very quietly."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was wondering where my tea went.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, hold on. Did you steal anything while you were in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Garmelie...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insight-check him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Insight-check that bitch!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is about as hard to read as anyone you've come across in the Feywild.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I try?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we don't need an insight check to know he was lying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I got a 17. I'm way more better than Scanlan. Natural insight. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28. Through his teeth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Start giving him the frisk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These vines wrap up around his legs and he's like, "Oh, I was just!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Into the pockets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just let it happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are the pockets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In his vest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In his vest pockets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There better not be an owlbear in there or I'm going to be very upset.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach into the other, and your arm goes quite far into the pocket, farther than it should--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You little devil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What? This is extremely degrading! We had a deal." It's empty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this a pocket of holding? I think about the fancy silverware that I might've seen in Syldor's house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing. Just an empty space.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, keep going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think of fancy teacups, because he mentioned drinking tea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (melodically) Nothing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've never stolen anything, shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Think of gold. Think of gold, Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cast Friends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I'm not materialistic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to have a working relationship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do you say that like it was a bad thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He smacks the side of your arm and is like, "Get your hand out of my pocket!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth. Check the fur.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't check the fur.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Excuse me?!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's give him a chance to 'fess up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is not why we're here to talk. We are here to discuss the elements of our agreement. Two "things I require your aid in taking, and then I show you to the outskirts of the Shademirk."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like now we already know where the outskirts of the Shademirk are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But do you know of the dangers that are on your way?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you told us about all three dangers that we have to face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Hut of Wodenna, the Last Camp of Sorudun the Happy, and the theatre.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you think those are all the dangers?! There are so many! It's a dangerous place! "Stop touching me!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, hands off him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just tell us what the two things are we that we need to steal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. I require a piece of a threshold crest."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of a threshold crest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Giant stones on the outside of the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Threshold crest." Which you recall are the blue stones that are in the wall around the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the stupidest thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why is that stupid?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because then they can't go back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't have to get it from the wall. I'm sure they build it from something and there might "be a reserve somewhere."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, in the other dimension that they came from. You realize Syngorn didn't originate here in the Feywild, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I understand, but just..."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, lord have-- oh, sweet Sarenrae.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, okay, a threshold-- a piece?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A piece of a threshold crest. Just but a sliver."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The same material?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The same material enchanted that is functionally able to be "utilized in the same fashion."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No problem. What else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great. I also want the High Warden Tyrelda's hat."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Her hat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we know what her hat looks like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a pointed, small tricorn made of green velvet that she wears when she goes on like excursions outside of the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, she's got a pirate tri-corner hat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's small and very long. Imagine a pirate hat with a little more of an elven sleekness to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, like a Robin Hood hat? Like Peter Pan!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, like Peter Pan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wasn't looking forward to this moment, but that actually sounds like fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it, that's all you need?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all! And I will fulfill my side of the deal."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a vague idea of why you might want a piece of the threshold crest, but why would you want the High Warden's hat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because I have my reasons."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So. Are you going to give us what you stole now? We have an arrangement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We do have an arrangement."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's only fair. Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaches into his pocket and pulls out what looks to be a very finely sculpted bronze statue of Syldor that was gifted for essentially his work with Emon and establishing better trade routes between that city and this city. It's basically a good job, salesman of the year award of Syldor's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They stole his Emmy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's like they stole his gold watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got it right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a belt buckle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right on my belt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So weird, you pickpocketed the thing that wasn't even expensive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did you take that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't help it, he's a klepto.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! It was there and nobody was looking."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because it ultimately doesn't matter. You know how awards work. Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come, we have a hat to catch!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you want to come along?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, hang on, before we all leave. Vex and Vax, what did your dad do back in the day? Because he knows Allura and he talked about knowing Thordak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's an ambassador to the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he have any type of fighting capabilities?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. If he does, we never saw it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he'll bore you to death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he can talk a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because it sounds like he was a part of the mission to lock in Thordak 11 or so years ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? No way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He mentioned that he's been down this road before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was the one that sent us off to find...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a traveling salesman that sells politics. He's not anything all that fancy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if he sells politics, there could be a lot in selling war against a dragon. I'm not trying to be a dick, but your father was kind of a dick so I'm just questioning it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's an asshole. That's totally fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not trying to talk shit about your family.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, feel free.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Y'all should totally fight right now. Just fight in the room while we're all here and take off your clothes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only way to solve it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Totally, totally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's a very dark and disturbing thought. I'm very impressed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you! I've been learning from you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Now I feel guilty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't mean to question to him, he just said a few things that raised a few hairs on the back of my spine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, maybe we can ask him about it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have hair on your spine?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: About this time I use Alter Self to go a little half-Minxie and get those-- like when a dog is pissed off and it puffs up the hair, towards Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She shows you this emerging patch of fur that is like, shh, pushing out the back of her shoulders.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's real sexy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty sweet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty hot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is a very fair point, although I would say I think it would be best to talk to Allura about your father rather than talk to him again, I think he's possibly had enough of us for a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we have the meeting, we go get the tricorn hat from her, like, boudoir and then we go get the crest on the way out, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we can even find a clue about where this crest thing is from the meeting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grand! That's a great idea! That's a great idea."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we sleep before the meeting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the meeting is actually tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It just says we get one meeting, I don't think it's been "sheduled" yet. Should we go "shedule" it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's "shedule" the meeting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or maybe we could send one of the shitty guards to go "shedule" it for us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he back from getting us food? Oh no, I hope he's not, because I want to send a second one out there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! Because you're a lady.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I'm a baroness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think they're going to leave us all alone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and check, you check the hallway, and the guard hasn't returned and the three suddenly spin around as the door opens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hello! We require a meeting with the High Warden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need to take this with me. To make the meeting schedulable."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Shedulable."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shedulable."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bidet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When would we like the meeting? Tonight or tomorrow?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys did wake up about four hours ago?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Today! Later today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll take the meeting today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right after siesta.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like northern Alaska.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. I'll return." He turns around and leaves and the two guards look at each other like, thank god it wasn't us. They both stand at the ready as he goes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let that be a lesson to the two of you about making fun of a foreigner's accent. I'm watching you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the door slowly closes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Schedulable!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So! What are you waiting for?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's your bed, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Brings up one leg.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket jumps up on the bed and snuggles in with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, don't, ugh!" (bear noises)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, they're shedding on it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (creak, crash) The bottom cracks and the bed actually falls flat on the ground. The springs destroyed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right, it's a futon now. It's like college.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we seen any of these threshold crests on our way in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we walked past some.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're those little blue stones that are keeping the city here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't say it like it's obvious. I don't pay attention to shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we just need a sliver of one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so like, I could take Vax's head and smash it against one and then pick up the pieces. No, that's a bad thing from your frown.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Although Grog doesn't have the worst idea. And I don't mean smashing Vax's head. That's not what I mean. But don't we have some hidden gems, because I'm really terrified if we start hacking away at these stones what might happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They might not be able to return.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So maybe we can do something kind of fakey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he asleep? He's asleep, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's currently partially crushed by Trinket on the bed and goes like, "I can hear you!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we have jewels and shit, just stuff hanging around, but what does that do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, how do we know if we can chip a piece off without ruining it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wouldn't risk it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we should talk to some people and ask a couple of questions around town first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Maybe somebody, maybe the High Warden knows. Maybe we can sneak it out of there or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just drop it in passing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh! Like a souvenir. "Can we have a piece of your threshold crest?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly like that, Grog, exactly like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm the leader. So what do we do until the guard comes back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door opens, the guard comes around with food and hands it out to the rest of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anybody have money for a tip? Because I think you're supposed to tip them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're not supposed to tip your guards." (boof) Slams the door behind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's an Emon tradition. We're overseas, remember.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like it here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You finish your meal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's delicious!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And prepare yourselves for an excursion into the city of Syngorn to seemingly steal a piece of the threshold crest and the High Warden Tyrelda's travel hat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn into Minxie and resign to the idea that I'm going to be sleeping with Garmelie and Trinket and just cuddle next to them in Minxie mode.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you coming with us, though, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're not sleeping?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. It's like one in the afternoon, so we'll probably just go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you know, blow a couple more spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's one use of your beast form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just come on, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just save it. You can stay like that, just walk close to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I going to freak people out if I walk around like this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, I hope so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck them, that's what I say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way outside into the city streets of Syngorn to hopefully wait for the other guard, who returns about ten minutes later to tell you, "It has been 'sheduled.'"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah, very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As soon as you wish, attend to the central palace and there you will be greeted."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you leaving now?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we waste no time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Makes a big whistle and the other guards come down, and collectively you now have four guards watching you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. There were four of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop Minxie form, because that seems very aggressive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we walk I say to Vax: Oi, Vax. What is the reason for this meeting? When we get in there, what do we say to her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we have your hat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe work our way around to it. Well, I would like advice other than this little hairy man for how to get to the bog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And also what we might face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And how we can fight what we might face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She might know about Fenthras and the bow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, exactly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, Scanlan, can't you go invisible too? What if you two little buggers just went off and like found it on your own while we were distracting Captain Fancy Hat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Find Fenthras on our own, what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you go invisible along with Fauny Tim over here and you just go find the fucking hat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the hat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if she's wearing the hat? What if the hat is on her head?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, that usually is the plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And thus ended the story of Vox Machina, murdered terribly in the streets of Syngorn by their own people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Clutching a hat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tarantino film.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes? Do you have business in the palace?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: G'day mate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do. We have a meeting with the High Warden Tyrelda.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all follow suit and are led through the main entryway to the palace itself. On the inside you can see these giant archways that the pillars that hold them up look like trees that spread to the top like the stone boughs actually hold a canopy made of marble with beautiful portraits and long artistic renditions of the creation of Syngorn, the people, each bloodline that has progressed and taken on the central political structure of the city. As it goes, you can see busts of people who have been of historical importance to Syngorn, and eventually you're brought to the very end of this hallway. Amongst a series of other offshoot hallways and doors, there is the next portion of this journey, this large central chamber. The door is already partially ajar. You are led into what seems to be the equivalent of a throne room, but it appears that there is a half-circle table in the center of the room and a series of chairs that now sit empty across from one side. Your side. The other side of the table, you see sitting quietly and patiently, an older elven woman, you can see the grey in her hair and the crow's-nests at the corner of her eyes, which in elven years means she's quite old, she's probably close to 150 or 200 years old, by your gathering. They can live quite a long time. She would be in the equivalent of her late 50s.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not old enough for our party to kill mercilessly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's a whole different gauge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Throwback Thursday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she wearing a hat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is not wearing a hat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. All right, she lives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard behind ushers you guys forward toward the chairs. You all get the idea that you should sit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We sit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there chairs for all of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are chairs for all of you but Trinket, who currently, one of the guards is helping to put his hands out in front to keep back, like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good way to lose a finger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wouldn't mess with him if I were you, just to be safe. And I walk up and I give Trinket a kiss on the nose and I put him in his Pokeball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard leaps back for a second. "That's much easier."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just watch closely, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step back, you all find your seats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just talking to my boobs. No big deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This meeting room pavilion, and as you all have your seat, you see the High Warden waiting there patiently, smile on her face but definitely an expression that shows both intelligence and guard. As you all sit, she looks about the group, asks, "So you've all come and made arrangements to "meet with me. You've come quite a ways and with very short notice. I'm curious as to what your "reasonings are. Please, state your business."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You probably recognize the two of us even if you don't know us. We're Syldor's children. This is my sister Vex'ahlia. I'm Vax'ildan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Strange. It has been some time since you've been within the city. Welcome."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're back because we're searching for a certain bow, Fenthras? Said to be within the Murk something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bog of Eternal Stench, I believe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shadowmurk Bog. That's the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Shademirk?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shademirk. That's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, darling. I think that the city's intentions are in the best possible place. Brings me a great deal of personal satisfaction, actually. I would like to offer our aid in service of the very same purpose, and that bow, in my sister's hands, will go a long way to felling more of these beasts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. You stroll in here with a great deal of arrogance and an air of self-importance. Not in "a way that is negative, more in a way that means you aspire, and I hope, not reaching beyond your "means. If you have indeed felled these two members of the Conclave as you say, then perhaps this "errand to the Shademirk is not as dangerous as one would expect. I would not deny you this, and if "you indeed have these capabilities, you should have no issue surviving the Mirk, "you and your companions."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Syldor sent us here because he said you would know what we might face in the Shademirk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other creatures began to crawl up from the bog "itself, and to this day feed off the life of those they can reach. The only thing that holds its "spread at bay is the Gilded Run, the rapids. Now, it's found balance, and we watched it spread, as "those who've lived here for a long time do. It does not force any sort of immediate threat to any "of us, and it serves its own purpose. It has its new-- I shouldn't say new, it's been hundreds of "years now-- but its own life, its own biome. And we could not be ones to mess with that, if you "will. But it is dangerous, and it is, for those who have scouted far enough to see it, say it is "akin to wading through an oil slick. It is to walk into a hungry swamp that "never gives up its need to feed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sounds lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, quite."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You say you've lived here. I know the city goes back and forth between the Feywild. Do you travel more freely?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't in my older years. When I was younger, perhaps. It is important to maintain an "idea of the current state of the Feywild. Every few decades, perhaps every generation, just to be "certain when we have to undergo this transition that we don't come into the middle of a war zone "in its own right. But I grow tired in my older years, and find myself chained to politics more "often than not."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, there are thin areas between the planes, there are doorways, and we have magical "means to send small scouting parties between this veil."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't want to be a bother, yes, but. Do they entail any part of those threshold crests? I'm wondering because perhaps we might find ourselves in need of traveling, as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We know we're strangers. But we read much wisdom and experience in your eyes, and it would seem that you have encountered this place yourself, or have experience in the past with those who have, and we're just looking for an edge, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, do I want to roll this one or do I want to roll--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, just pick one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ever-plight of Laura Bailey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! That's a good, that's a good, I'm glad I switched!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are 300 fucking dice on this table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have refined the art of creating the threshold crests. We have personalized "enchantments that can be utilized for our trained spies, our trained guides, our trained scouts. We "keep them under lock and key, but when an endeavor requires the transference between planes, we do on "occasion allow these to go into the hands of our greatest guides."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If a party would be in search of an item that would be of great use to your survival, would that be worthy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen, we know we're bastards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop bringing up the bastard part!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clearly. Look into my eyes, we share the same goal. Half of my blood is yours. I want to kill the threat to your city and to all cities. I ask with complete humility. I know what I'm asking. Please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one? Him or me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck, can I give him advantage, can I help him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Using Luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's got Luck. He has his own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, you motherfucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ouch. I rolled the same thing. Low number twice. No, that's a big five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, no, everything's ten. I thought everything was a ten!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that's right, you're right. So that is a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate your intent, and I understand that our current paths will hopefully align in the "near future. However, such artifacts are very important to us and the business within Syngorn, "and I mean no offense in saying that you are no longer residents of our city. As such, no, I "cannot provide you with these crystals. However, when the time comes, and you retrieve this bow which "you say you seek, I hope that we can count each other brethren on the battlefield."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look around the room? Are there any doors open, ajar, leading into a bedroom with a hat on a rack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any guards in here with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the guards have led you in, they're just back by the front door you entered.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a hat rack and a Starbucks, that's what's in the room right there. It's a hat rack and a Starbucks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19. Natural.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm rusty on my rules. That should've been a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a three, but because of reliable talent, anything lower counts as a ten. Ten plus my persuasion of seven is 17. I'm just rusty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is racist!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that is a very closely guarded item that would've required a roll of 20 or higher to succeed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The whole time I was like, that seems wrong to me; that it's so low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah man, reliable talent's good for that reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did your luck suck that time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now. Unless you have other business?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a little bit of business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good, carry on. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take out my beret and I put it on and I say, why, this one was a very special beret I got by defending Whitestone against an invasion of vampires, singlehandedly freeing the city from the scourge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That sounds entirely believable."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. It's a fine garment woven by a master craftsman. I hear you have a fine hat, as well, that you've been seen wearing about town. Is that true?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wish I could say this isn't true, but it's actually true. He is genuine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have been known to have a few garments based on where I'm going, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A connoisseur, really. Could you humor an old gnome like me and show me... I hear tell of a green hat. A tri-tip hat, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought it was blue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blue hat?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Might be green.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's also colorblind, I should mention.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tri-tip, triangular-- I just hear it's fantastic, I've never seen one quite like it up close. I was wondering if I could take a look-see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because you didn't sleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you didn't sleep, Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing and cheering) [no audio]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bards! "From political requests to a hat collector, this is indeed a very strange afternoon "in the palace. Yes, I can have one of my servants show you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you so much, it would mean so much to me. I've never met a hat I didn't like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then I am certain you will be fulfilled."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we just wait here, or is it going to be a while?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He enters. "Yes, mother?" "Could you please show this strange little gnome man to the hat room?" "Yes, of course. Yes. Follow me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a hat room? I have a hat room in my place, too!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's splendid. Now, is there any other business?"
