lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to be clear, you would say that the river is probably our safest mode of entry into the bog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It surrounds the bog and runs past the southern portion of it, so you'll most likely come "upon the river one way or another. Lest you wish to traverse the Green Sea, but that I would not "recommend, either."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there's no real easy way into the bog, is what you're saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's no easy way to anything in the Feywild, my child."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you seen the tree yourself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there river men who run boats on the river?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, the river tends to run itself." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had that coming. That's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you wish to inquire about my shoes? My coat perhaps..."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're amazing shoes. I didn't notice them until you pointed them out, sorry. No, continue on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is that all?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's all, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Good luck. I wish you safe--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait, wait, lady!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: High Warden, High Warden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: High Warden. I'm sorry. I was just curious. It's my first time to Syngorn, and it's in the Feywild. It's special, right? Is there a gift shop? A visiting the temple and sights of Syngorn type of shop?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I went to Syngorn and all I got was this lousy shirt?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to make that shirt!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shirt after this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll see what Braum can do. Braum, please escort them to some semblance of a gift shop."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thank you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good luck. Safe travels. Don't die. Let us see "each other on the battlefield soon to slay a dragon. Now, please, be on your way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We appreciate your time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys get up and leave, Trinket goes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's in my necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, Trinket is in your necklace, so Trinket does nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket does nothing but stare outside of the necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way out of the room, the guards following suit. You can see the lightish brownish reddish tousled hair of the elven boy who's waiting, he's wearing very fine clothing, though very baggy on his scrawny frame. As you all step out, he says, "All right, so, I'm to take you "to the hat room, I believe. Oh, you're going to be very happy. It's quite the room."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The room I could care less about, it's those hats!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I think you'll still be pleased. Are you all coming?" (noises of agreement)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Traveling with Scanlan, we've all become amateur hat enthusiasts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out my hat and I put it on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, I pull out the rhinoceros horn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gong) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he pulls out a little masquerade mask and goes like, "Oh my goodness!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a hatter, too!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you get the monthly newsletter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I used to, until we came to the Feywild. It's very boring these days. Well, come, "please!" And he darts off excitedly down the hallway. The guards groan loudly behind you. You make your way through the second hallway on the left of the palace, down a flight of stairs into a storage room. To the left you can see what looks to be the entrance to some sort of a heavily barred metallic doorway, about ten feet wide, about 12 feet tall. Further down you come to two doorways. He pulls out a keyring, goes, "No, not that one. Ah, here we are." It opens up into a small room, you can see in here, it's a display room. In here you can see ornamental armor and helmets and all sorts of classic Syngorean designs, which change often because, well, elves when they don't have a lot of things to fill their time with, it's all about designing new outfits and new armor. There's a whole display of very classic designs for the guards, for the watchers, for the people who first founded Syngorn. It's like a history walk through. But there is a section that is primarily helmet designs for different stations and, "This is as close to a hat "room as we have. This here is part of the original Temple of Ioun design. It is a delightful piece." He keeps going on and on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see the hat that we're looking for in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see there is a small rack to the side which is for more just things that are used and you can see there are like wide-brim, rainy-day, carriage-driving hats, you can see there are far-brimmed cloak hoods that are used for horse-riding beneath the rain, you can see there are a few more curved up to one side archer-based hats, and you can see there a nice green velvet hat that is resting across.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that the one area with hats?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they all just jumbled in together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all jumbled in together in that corner and then the actual helmets are against the wall in different setups.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go ahead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I nudge Vax and I point it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, look at all those codpieces across the room!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are the guards in here with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I prat-fucking-fall. I pratfall right in front of the guards, on the opposite side of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk to the other side of the room and I just fall over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eat shit, knock shit over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perform check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. Can it be acrobatics, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, acrobatics is avoiding the fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. Okay. 19?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to take some shit down with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do, delightfully so. You fall over, trip, go into a tumble, grab arm over pieces of metallic armor, (crashing sound).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, oh god, did you see that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, Vex, are you okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think there was a marble on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was Lady Vex'ahlia, the Baroness of Whitestone. I could sue you! I could sue you for negligence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight-of-hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold on, he's making a check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take the hat. You place it away. Everyone seems to be focused on the currently yelling Vex'ahlia--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow, I think I hurt my wrist!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You will get a letter, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This was, look, I apologize if your friend is clumsy, but this wasn't part of our job "description, okay, it's been a very--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your five-star review just went to a four, okay? I just want to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Braum pushes his way in and goes like, "I am so terribly sorry. I didn't mean-- I hope this "hasn't ruined your opinion of the hat room."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we could just see a gift shop, I would be thrilled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I say to the side, I go, (coughs) pinch my knee, is that the one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you feeling all right, sir?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, (coughs) pinch my knee if that's the one. No, to the little, to the little satyr.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's just find a gift shop, Lady Tyrell doesn't need to hear anything about this. Let's just move on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lady who?"

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: High Warden Tyrelda.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tyrelda.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, well, there's another lady named Lady Tyrell, who's...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is amazing what my handwriting does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you put in that tea, Percival?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I'm glad to see this hasn't ruined your opinion of the collections here."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just the safety codes, really.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you took us to the gift shop, it might fix things. Okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then come, come! You two clean this up!" And the two guards go, "What?" "Yes, my lord." And the two guards eye you very intensely as they walk over and start picking up all the pieces of armor--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start pretending like I'm doing a Cure Wounds spell to her wrist, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys make your way out, with two of the guards now; two of them are now left behind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As we walk out, I just make sure the two guards are, I hope this didn't interrupt your schedules for today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Shedule."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, schedule.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somehow their chin goes higher. It's impressive, really. You make your way through, down another set of hallways, back towards the beginning of the palace, he goes, "It's not really "a gift shop, the closest thing that we could ascertain based on your request is, we do have a "small collection of gifts and knick-knacks we've received from allies over time that really aren't "much use to us."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, you're taking us to the lost and found? Please! This is the high baroness Lady Vex'ahlia!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps you'll find something you like."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, lost and found is a wonderful place to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a combination lost and found and just... gifts from political allies that didn't "understand the High Warden's aesthetic. Yes, no, please, this way please." And he leads you back to the main hallway you guys walked through, a little ways towards the entrance, and then another hallway to the left, he unlocks and this is straight-up like a dark storage room, it is just boxes and boxes that are sealed and he lights a small lantern on the side. It flickers to life, and the flame itself, as opposed to a low oil lantern flicker is like a bright glowing light, you can see this is a magically set lantern, as most of the lights in the city are just everlit torches or things that flicker on and off as a light spell. It illuminates the room around you and you can see no one's walked in here in a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are for sale?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, these are for the taking should you wish."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, what do we see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I ask a logistical question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Garmelie with us or did we leave him behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog might know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, 19, are you searching, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is this an investigation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, natural 20!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, propeller beanie!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth is distracted by the pretty light in the fixture.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan comes up next to her and is equally distracted by this wonderful magical light. Like two moths to a flame. Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, thanks, it's great!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it like Storage Wars, where there might be something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could, it could be depending on how well you search.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I searched terribly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth starts talking up Braum. Braum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Braum.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Braum. So, Braum. Where're you from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Syngorn?" (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good start.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have to distract him, he said it's all for the taking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's all for-- really, oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's fine, we don't have to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You didn't see any distraction. You didn't see anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am so confused by all of you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to do an arcana check to see if there's anything magic in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make an arcana check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll join you. Two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, I just rolled off the table. How did I do that? 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your untrained, though natural arcane instincts reveal to you that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can speak with animals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing even remotely magical seems to cross your attention span, unfortunately, and you guys spend a good hour in here sifting through--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As, as we're digging in the corner, I say, I thought maybe coming back here I might like this city a little bit better, and I was fucking wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This place fucking sucks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, there's nothing in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, let's leave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yeah, sure. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pick something pretty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your four-star rating just went down to a three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am picking something random from the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'll also pick something random out of spite. I'll take this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a fine tobacco box at your disposal now, Keyleth. You can write that down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like it. I chose it on purpose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you find half of a jeweler's kit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's perfect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am excited. Was it literally cut in half, like literally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half the supplies are there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And did you say I had a half a tobacco box? Or no, just a tobacco box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had an older tobacco box.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An old tobacco box. All right. Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Braum at this point goes, "I hope you've all found something you liked."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I grab something random, too. I mean, if we're all doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You reach into the Syngorean Wal-mart gift bag on the way out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, secret Santa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on. Roll for value.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. I'll do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No whammies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bring out what looks to be a really intricately carved music box made of dark wood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's neat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you shake it, you hear (ting-ting) little remnants of the last winding come through, and it seems to still play.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mine. I'm writing it down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I want to reach in and grab something out of there too. All right, fine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's been there for a while, so like the roots are growing out and everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, with leaves coming out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take a bite out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a stale potato.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a constitution check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth takes the potato. Okay, give it to me, give it to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh here you go. And I squash it in my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (squelch) up the sides of it. Braum goes, "If you could clean that up?" And the guard goes aww and starts picking up the potato chunks off the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're down to one!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we should--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --get out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, do we find any broken threshold crests?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, wait, do we find any pictures of threshold crests? Or a postcard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We leave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll just go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got the hat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Braum leads you out of the room, closes and locks it behind, you guys walk back to the hallway that split off, you go past the large metal door again, find your way up into the foyer area at the front of the palace, he goes, "Well, I hope I've been of help to you. I hope I've delivered your "interest in seeing our fine selection of helmets and hats here in Syngorn?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am more than satisfied. I will write a five-star review.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Goodbye."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard that was cleaning the potato follows suit, you guys now have two guards, the other two have not returned. So you have two guards following you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't shake these guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, some of us could slip in anyway, but what do you think we will find there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I don't know. I just noticed, because I wasn't paying attention to all the talking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Percy and I can fake them out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fake them out? What do you mean, fake them out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is he around? Don't say it out loud.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no fake. It's not faking. I've got a plan. It's not fake, I've got a plan. It's a good plan. But we should sit, recuperate, go somewhere quiet and figure out how we're getting to the bog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long have we been awake at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You mean since you guys woke up this morning, I'd say six hours?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't want to go try and bust one of the crests we already saw?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could seriously like fuck it up, what if they can't get back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who gives a fuck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They have an entire army to help fight Thordak.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't think that far ahead, I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, Vex, they could repair it; they have magicians here and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you repair a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With arcane juju.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You make a very good point. A very good point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they said they got these stones from the other side, from our realm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should just go fucking check them out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The two guards are here to whole time, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We should really go take a nap, I think we should go take a nap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This dusk is really making me--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very low; nobody else hears it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got plenty of energy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, is, is anyone else super duper tired? Are you guys tired?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm--

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Tired.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So tired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look at the guards. I mean, are you guys tired? I mean, how do you even know what fucking time it is, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you wish to be escorted to your quarters, then?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would love to get some sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please follow us." And they both lead on, leading you back to the rooms you guys had set for the evening's rest. Eventually you get to your rooms, the guards stay stationed outside, and you are led into your individual spaces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's windows though, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the guards leave us in our rooms, obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, are we all in our own individual rooms?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have earrings, we could just talk on the earrings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all go into a room together, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Super duper happy, all together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have four rooms at your disposal and you all say, we're going to go sleep, and all go into one room with a broken bed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're a close-knit family.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can make your own assumptions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can go into our own rooms and I can fix it if we don't want to tip people off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we do what we want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're fucking close, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys all enter the largest room where you met before, and as you all find your way in there, one of the guards goes, "You're going to sleep--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember, right, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yes, we're very holy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it's been quite a while. I'm rather hungry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I told you we were holy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan and Vex, make deception checks, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perception?

lines.name: MATT, LIAM
lines.text: Deception.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Deception. Oh. Ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cackles) That's the lie that goes through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you say you're tired and ready to rest, the guard goes, "Mm-hm." And then when you say polyamorous, the guard goes, "Oh." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, man. We are freak-ay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll keep a close watch."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth says, we're totally polyamorous--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You! No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I turn Percy and Vax into squirrels with Polymorph. See? Polyamorous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two guards look at each other, very disturbed and say, "You've already shared too "much, we don't judge, just please go 'sleep'." They both hold their blades at the ready, both just like, "What is my life right now?" All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We may need you to clean up for us later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please! Go! Sleep!" You guys are now closed off inside your room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the squirrels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As squirrels. What are you going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I drop Polymorph. That's what polyamorous means, right, guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Garmelie, show thyself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has his sketchbook at the ready and is like, "Because I mean..."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well." He closes the book. "So. I believe someone here took a hat?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I might have a hat for you. The other adventure didn't turn out so well, and I really want to give you this hat. I'm wondering-- fuck it, I don't have anything to say, take the fucking hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he puts it on. It's a little small. But he goes, "Ah, it's fine." Smiles back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So worth it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. That was definitely worth it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems extremely proud and happy that this hat is now in his possession. "One of two. Now, "the second part."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any ideas there, Garmelie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You passed by those threshold crests several times, I'm assuming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me get this straight, Garmelie. You require of us a piece of a threshold crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any threshold crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just as long as it's a threshold crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And looks like a crest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a threshold crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A threshold crest."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, Keyleth. The thing we talked about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I start casting Stone Shape right under the threshold of the door to the room that we're in, and I cut out a crest from the threshold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What crest do you create? What does it look like?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A Whitestone crest. From the threshold of the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We break it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing and cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't cast Friends on people. It's not nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as his ears, his pointed ears slowly slink back and his hair stands up all across the back of his head, his beard almost bristles out into spines as the hat goes (poink) and pops off and hits the ground. He snatches it up. Grabs the piece.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's your threshold crest. Piece of a threshold crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. The Shademirk, then? Come, follow me, grab "your things." (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cannot wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now." He vanishes. And Grog, you feel a little tug on your finger to pull you forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I had that coming. We now have even more of a reason to make haste. This is a very small room, "and I've been following behind him for quite some time. Let's go. Now, quickly." And you see Grog being pulled forward by the finger, and you guys get the feeling that he's leading you out of the city, invisible, by Grog's finger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going this way. Follow me, chaps!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Follow the finger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are the guards following?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two guards are following, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo, that was really fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My hair is messed up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good sesh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good. That was really...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel loose as a goose. Let's go see this bog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I transform into a goose and come out as a goose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You-- (frustrated noise) Never mind." The guards follow at a very healthy distance now, both whispering to each other as they watch you walk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we made a really good impression on this city coming back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to kill you later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are led back through the main portion of Syngorn, towards the front gates where the watchers reside. The doors are opened for you, and you are escorted out the front gate, where the guards very happily leave you to be. And both turn around at each other and go, (heavy sigh) and they walk back inside the confines of the outer Syngorean wall. You guys are now back out in the wilds of Syngorn, the finger tugs lead you out past the front of the city, through the marshlike mandrake fields that you initially traversed when you made your way to Syngorn, and then find your way back into the Ever-Shifting Grasses, heading duskward, towards where it seems the dusk sun will set.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Duskward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Duskward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Always duskward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hate that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's also nightward, seaward, or tangleward. Which would you prefer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are those different directions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, those are different directions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tangleward? Did you say tangleward?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tangleward. It was mentioned before, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I just thought of the Disney movie and I think I spaced out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you make your way towards where the grasses get heavy again, and you see Garmelie (foosh) once again take visible form again and be like, "Ah, sorry, "that concentration for a while really gets to you, I'm so glad to be out of that stuffy place. So! "Shall we?" Rights his hat. And even in righting it, it's a little crooked to one side and he begins marching duskward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Onward to the theater!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! No theater! We are avoiding the theater! No."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Garmelie, how far of a journey is it to this bog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Say about four times since we met?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That doesn't mean anything to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four times since we met.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just curious, why are you so worried about the theater? I love the theater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have my reasons." And he continues walking forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, great. Good talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's been 14 hours since we've met.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we travel any faster than that? Can we mist, can we tree, can we...?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait a minute, you could-- if you know a tree is-- that would be pretty stupid, to just pop out of the cancerous tree, but if we know a tree is there, couldn't you potentially just fucking do it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've had a lot of good ideas. That's not one of them. That's a bad idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's not wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! Keyleth, what if you just open up the cancerous tree, we reach through, we grab the fucking bow, and then we're out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you're not entirely wrong, I don't know if I can Teleport via Plants because generally that takes knowing the plant. However, I do have Tree Stride, which means we can-- nope, never mind, I can only do that on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wah-wah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are not sending Keyleth the goose into a bog to retrieve a bow from an angry cancerous tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I'm loosey! I'm a loosey goose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would look amazing on an epitaph, I'm just saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can mist there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would that save time, I don't remember how fast we go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I might have to take a hot nap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A hot nap?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Didn't you guys just take a hot nap? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. The answer is yes. I can do all those things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, let's travel for a bit and then we'll take a proper break.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we can get to the edge of the bog, then we'll take a sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I think the edge of the bog is kind of far, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll start our journey, and the next leg of our journey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's get going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll go until we're tired.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like the sound of that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. (belches) (laughing and cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most impressive for a lady."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. That's a baroness burp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Robert Durst shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys push on further northward at the behest of Garmelie, you push for another two hours or so through the Ever-Shifting Grasses, and as you get further and further north, the color of the grass seems to go from that deep verdant green to almost a maroon purplish color.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pop Trinket out of the necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He attacks some of the grass and chews it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, get it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't touch the grass, it'll get angry at you! It'll yell at you for a week!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think that applies here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, darling. It's okay. Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do not yell at my bear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just trying to protect him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give him some grass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And just keeps going forward through the grass fields.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the grass seem angry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it just seems to be changing color.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Suck it, grass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say that, the grass goes from a purplish color to a deep, deep red around you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because you... suck out the joy of all of us living around you, and you're so amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That makes it even worse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not a compliment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're still going in the same direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, you suck out bad--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab Keyleth's hand. Let's take a walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you, as you're walking, the actual grasses around you are getting more and more dense and are catching on your feet and you're finding that your progression is getting slower and slower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, no. I have Landstride, which means I don't slow against any land.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a hooded lantern. I could set this whole fucking thing ablaze.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The red goes to a deep cinder-like red.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to have roll initiative on grass?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does no one-- I'm going to take a moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like the grass feels our emotions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your emotions. Because you yelled at it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lovely field, I apologize for the rudeness of my compatriots. We will be gentle trouncing through you. We will make as little mark as we can and enjoy the splendor of your ever-changing colors. You are majestic, you are windswept-- I'm flirting with grass-- you are everything I could hope for in a beautiful view.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sing a song.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you sing? (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Keep growing. Keep flowing, knowing you can always count on me.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (singing) For sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, I want you to make a persuasion check against the grass? Adding the d10 inspiration die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, d10 inspiration. Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do an interpretive dance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, persuade that plant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was leaning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a leaner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That jumped, but that's still fine, okay, it's. Persuasion check? Oh yeah, that's not bad. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight plus six plus seven. (counting) 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's more than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the interpretive dance of Keyleth amongst the tattered angry grasses, the beautiful vocal stylings of Scanlan Shorthalt, and Percy speaking out a wondrous poem towards the Ever-Shifting Grasses, you watch as the deep bright red subsides into the relaxed purple, and eventually goes back to a dull green, and you find your traveling no longer impeded as it once was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good job!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You successfully parlayed with a field.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First doors, then grass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't talk shit to grass!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you want to mow this? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So we have choices now. We have the Moonbrush before us, or we have the Green Sea, which is far "seaward of here. I would recommend the Moonbrush."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then we should go the other way. Because we don't trust a fucking thing you say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the High Warden did say--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- to avoid the Green Sea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do you recommend the Moonbrush?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because it's the only real route to get to the Gilded Run."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is the Gilded Run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Gilded Run are the rivers that surround it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. You're looking for the Shademirk. You have to get through the Gilded Run to get the "Shademirk. You have to go through the Moonbrush to get to the Gilded Run."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the theater?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No theater!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so we're going through the brushy moon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes! Come, come."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah? Are you okay with that, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long have we been awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are... you've been awake for about 12 hours now, I'd say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we want to mist there, then we have to sleep. But we'll press on for a few more hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The canopy of the trees themselves are like long weeping willows that sag and give this very ominous feeling to the entire forest. You can see small mountain spires breaking through portions of the tree line in the distance occasionally, miles between each other, sometimes a cluster far closer together. He says, "There is a clan of sorts that "lives amongst the forest, we'll try our best to avoid. They are natural hunters and they are of "the lycan persuasion."

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, best that we avoid interaction. They are well-read, they have a society; we should "touch none of it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question. You mentioned we are going into the Moonbrush with lycan hunters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. It's a necessity."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no, it sounds like it. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a faction of pixies that live within, "known as the Wishers, and they are forever locked in a struggle. So avoid both, do not get involved "at all, and we'll be fine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do the lycan tend to populate trees, or if we stay up high can we maybe avoid them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the easiest way for them "to hunt, is unseen."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, there you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are ruled by a singular lycan lord, who goes by the name of Ukurat."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ulurat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ukurat."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ukurat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ukurat or Udurat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ukurat."

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Ukurat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "U-K-U-R-A-T."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bob.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He is to also be avoided."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that an elven name? Is that an elven word?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was, once."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, he used to be elven? He used to be elven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll avoid them, and avoid the Wishers, and also those things, "the little plants that you saw before?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mandrakes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mandrakes? Also everywhere. Avoid them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And we'll just avoid the other things I mentioned, so. Shall we?" And he begins to step and march up to the edge of the Moonbrush.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine. We've killed dragons, we'll be fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so stoked right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we-- okay, yeah. Sure. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way into the dark Moonbrush itself and as you walk into the forest, immediately you can hear the swell of distant crickets, thousands upon thousands, sourceless, fill the air around you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cricket noises, laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That works, I was going to look for cricket sounds here. That's also totally doable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone's got a really good one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys push forward for another half-hour or so, you in particular, Vex'ahlia, come upon what looks to be a series of stones, what looks to be a series of small structures, almost. Not like buildings per se, but intently placed obelisks of raw, rough stone. And as you come across and look on that side, you can see what looks to be the base of one of the mountain spires that sticks out, a large cave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any kind of markings on the obelisks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Get out of here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They just look rough and old. They've been placed there. It's old magic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God, you're so bad at D&D!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I suck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you do see around the ground right out in front of this cave what appears to be hundreds and hundreds of small objects, piles, what looks like fruits and flowers and bones and stone carvings, all sorts of things placed in front of this cave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check on one of the bones to see if I can identify where it came from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a nature check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the closest bone, I don't want to, ooh. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That ain't nothing to sneeze at.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's not. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28. This bone belongs to a larger bird, like a great eagle, you can't quite specifically make out what it is, but it's been carved with small letters into it of a language you can't understand. It looks like it's some sort of a ritual item that's been placed there in the ground. But as you pick up and make this moment noticed--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going stealth just because.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all hear a giant, echoing roar coming from the cave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was I fast enough?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (roars) What'd you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30. Okay, yeah. You just (bip) out; you are gone. The rest of you are right at the outside of this small clearing where all of these small objects have been placed, you hear this rumbling loud roar come tearing through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I step back with the bone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What are the rest of you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull the broom out from behind my back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I lean the bone over to Vex'ahlia and be like, is this Draconic?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it Draconic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not Draconic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God fucking damn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it anything that I recognize, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What languages do you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Elvish, Abyssal, Undercommon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, none of those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, at this time the trees behind you two, because the rest of you guys were staying back--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's you two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex and Keyleth. The trees (fwoosh) shift and close off the exterior. As you turn towards the entrance of the cavern, you can see emerging from the front a giant-- it's hard to really tell the first moment that it appears, but you see what looks to be a gargantuan dire bear-like entity made of crackling blue ghostly energy, shimmering, translucent, not actually a physical form, but massive in size. (stomping noises, roar)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did we get cut off? Did Vex and I get cut off from everybody else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. From everybody else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit! I grab Keyleth's wrist and I fly into the air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hold on for dear fucking life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A strength check!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't even see them, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can't see them and they just closed off in the trees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on! Is that a saving throw or just a check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bear, which is now, (stomping sounds), coming up towards you on the ground. Looks to Keyleth, (roars).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Speak With Animals!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you cast Speak With Animals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like I taught you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I say, we mean you no harm, great ghost bear! In fact, we brought you an offering and we just accidentally touched the other offering of yours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Où est la bibliothèque? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The cheese is old and moldy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None of the bear's face moves at all, but an echoing voice, in Common, not animal speak, comes blasting into both of your minds, and those of you guys outside of the trees, trying to find a way through, also hear this echo, "You have entered the domain of Orlan. You destroy and disgrace that "which was gifted. What do you offer in response to your travesty?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well, I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a hat. A really good hat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got an old tobacco box I got from lost and found.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, yeah, that's pretty good. I offer him a tea set.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull the tea set out, the bear claw reaches out and smashes it out of your hand and goes scattered and breaking across one of the stones and goes, "You walk into the realm of the "wild, unwatched, unrespecting. The beasts of this land hold no kinship with you. You will prove "offering yourself." And the tongue licks the lips.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? I turn into a giant scorpion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The scorpion takes its form, as it does the bear, (growls).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want an offering, you can have mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, am I hidden in or outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I sense you have kinship with beasts. You may pass, though I will not forgive this "infraction. You."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You shall be the prize."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The giant bear is looming over you now, and its size is so immense, probably 15 or 20 feet to the top of its shoulders.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket! I call Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You call Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I call Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaps out of your necklace and lands right beside you and just roars, (roars) up to the spirit. The spirit pulls back, (roars), roars back. And Trinket is so tiny by comparison and is up to the elbow, but Trinket lashes out at the giant bear, just leaps up towards it, pushes into it and starts tearing at its throat. The giant bear takes Trinket with one claw and slams him into the ground. Trinket rolls and gets back up, (growls), you can see a little bit of blood at the corner of its mouth, and just lunges again, this time jumping up onto the bear's back and clawing up onto its, onto the top of its torso. The bear (growls).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's pretty cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bear head looks up at Trinket now gnawing onto its hide, (gnawing sounds), seemingly to no real effect, and the bear reaches up and grabs Trinket and plucks him off the side and sets him down next to you. The bear now begins to speak in the language of bears, which only you can understand at this moment, says, "You walk with this one. Is she your charge?" And Trinket voices back, you hear the (bear noises) up to the bear, as you hear coming out, "She is everything. Her "life is mine. You take her, you take me, or we walk on and remember you as a kind soul." The giant bear looks down, "Very well. If you are at her side, I take your charge, as well." And the spirit bear steps forward, passing through you, and passing through Trinket's form, and what feels like this rush of warm air. And then disperses into a series of sparkles. You watch the energy slowly drift down and fade into the ground around you, and everything gets quiet. The trees slowly creak back and open the perimeter of this forest around you, leaving you alone. And Trinket comes up and licks your face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's looking at you, you look down and you can see the necklace that you hold is actually shimmering with a blue light that passed through you, and it slowly fades to its dark normal form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're part bear now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: What's it do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, guys! (cheering)

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: Is it Thursday yet? (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much for tuning in and watching with us this week. We're looking forward to the GenCon show in a few weeks, so some of you guys over on that side of the US can hopefully come and see us here as well, and join in this fantastic energy that tonight was just filled with. So hopefully we'll do more of these as time progresses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Loot Crate!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you Loot Crate for supporting us and being so awesome, being a fantastic sponsor, and yeah, I guess, is it Thursday yet? We'll see you guys in a couple weeks.
